name: Valerie Basham
text:
One of the best hungry howie's in town. They make everything just right!
The staff and nice and the place is generally clean.

name: Priya Pai
text: I placed an online order for delivery for my office team which was scheduled for delivery at 12pm which i had also called in at 10:30am to confirm they had the correct order. After waiting till 12:45pm with no sign of delivery, when I ‚Ä¶More

name: Jackson Kercy
text: It was our first time their from Fort Lauderdale and my daughter loved the pizza.

name: Golden Child
text: Food was old by the time I got it through delivery.  They used grub hub I think to deliver even though I ordered directly through hungry howies. Not happy about cold pizza

name: K Ford
text: Went to pickup my carryout order and was immediately greeted and informed I would be assisted momentarily.   Pizza looked fantastic and tasted great also. Fast convenient and appreciative service.  Thank you

name: BubblyBr0wnSuga
text: All I have to say is Lopez! He's a beautiful spirit, makes the best Howie bread for me and he's cute! üòä Thank you Lopez...you are one of the most BEST Manager's Ever. You are Appreciatedüòòüôèüòç

name: Malcolm Penny Jr
text: I was making an order and the speaker told me my wait time will be 1 hour and 40 mins while within a 2 miles radius only reason I chose delivery was because of transportation reasons but I just felt that was unacceptable. SMH

name: Kieara LaShaye
text: Excellent environment. Manager was very intelligent and employees were sharp and knowledgeable as well. Food A+

name: William Tucker
text: Live their food, delivery great too

name: Dee
text: I placed an online delivery order at 9:31pm. I was called at 9:58pm and was informed that my order would take 2 hours to arrive... 2 hour delivery?

name: Jackie Davis
text: Good food a drinks neat and clean. I like what I ordered. Nice people waiting on you. Will go back to see them.

name: Lauren Moody
text: Best hungry howies around!! Friendly and always clean.

name: R Forehand
text: First time trying Hungry Howie's and got the Italian calzone style sandwich and added Marinara. I couldn't tell any Marinara was added except a small speck at the edge of the crust. The crust was soft and had a good flavor. I might try it again.

name: Jeff Carter
text:
Awesome!
I called in a delivery and wasn‚Äôt too happy hearing that the delivery would be 45-85 mins! It showed up 17 mins after I placed my order. ‚Ä¶More

name: Justin Earhart
text: Great place!, great service!,  great management!,  well rounded store!,  friendly!,  great tasting pizza!, love the crust choices!.  The young lady at the front counter, I think her name was Lauren, is the sweetest and most helpful person!! ‚Ä¶More

name: Susannah Wright
text: One of the best Hungry Howie‚Äôs in town. They generally do a very good Cajun crust, and I recently found out they do an excellent granular garlic crust. Love them!

text: Love getting there Ham and Cheese subs.  Always nice and hot.

text: This location is incredibly slow. App order took over 2 hours. After a hour called to check status and my order hadn't even been started. Only pizza that delivers to my neighborhood or I would've canceled.

name: christian strand

name: Sally Smith
text: Ordered lunch for the office, part of the order showed up after 2 hours of waiting. The rest of my order DIDN'T SHOW UP! Never ordering from this branch again. I would advise others to do the same.

name: AnnaLaura Beason
text: Always ask for well done and extra season on your crust if not your pizza is a little underdone and without much seasoning but over all hungry howies is good pizza

name: Laniya L
text: worker had a very bad attitude , & charged me for something extra .

name: Connie Tynes
text: Front service was horrible she was very nonchalant didn't smile spoke very low. The pizza was half done.I had to take it back They just took the ticket without an apology and just maked it over. Sorry I was a bother

name: Sarah Creamer
text: I ordered online around 6:45 took over a hour for delivery then they forgot the salad the first thing on the receipt. Driver stated he would be back with it over 30 mins I called and was told he was on the way. 40 mins later still has not arrived....

name: Dan Moore
text: Great place for lunch delivery. Not a big fan of their pizza, but I really like their salads. I usually order a salad for lunch from bagel bagel 2-3 times a week, however I recently gave Hungry Howie's Salads a try. Very accommodating on ‚Ä¶More

text: well I did place a order online and it didn't come out correct, but the manger that night was very understanding and even sent over the missing items for no charge. THE PIZZA WAS HOT AND FRESH AND VERY GOOD. SO I WILL ORDER FROM THEM AGAIN JUST NOT ONLINE... LOL THANK U

text: Ordered by phone for pickup. Got home, opened the box and about a 4 inch circle in the middle of the pizza had no toppings, just the dough. Took it back and the manager said the toppings are by weight and that I got my money's worth, and he refused to take it back or refund my money. I wouldn't eat their crap again even if it was free.
